author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Bitcoin Holder GameStop Gets an ETF From Bitwise
description: The crypto-focused asset manager is offering a covered call strategy to provide share price exposure to GME while generating income.
content:
Bitwise Asset Management is tapping into the fervor surrounding GameStops (GME) bitcoin pivot with the launch of a new exchange-traded fund designed to offer exposure to GME and income.
Dubbed the B… [+1202 chars]
